title: The Adventure Zone: Dust - Episode 2
description: The Graysons continue their quiet investigation into the killing of Jeremiah Blackwater -- but outside interests are starting to take notice. Gandy plays a crazy game of poker. Errol ties up a quest. Augustus swears on his soul.
author: shows@themcelroy.family (The McElroys)
